title: Ethnic Cleansing (video game)
summary: Ethnic Cleansing is a first-person shooter video game for Microsoft Windows computers, created by the American white supremacist and hate organization National Alliance  (and published by its record label Resistance Records) on January 21, 2002. As part of a "Race War", the player controls a neo-Nazi skinhead or a Klansman and is tasked with killing stereotypical African, Mexican, and Jewish enemies, ending with then-Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon.
